verses.text: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
Peace be within thy walls, andprosperity within thy palaces.
For my brethren and companionsâ€™ sakes, I will now say, Peace bewithin thee.
Because of the house of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*our God I will seek thy good.
